link.title: Obtain device's password
link.description:
Roomba have to be on Home Base powered on.
Press and hold HOME button until you hear series of tones.Release button, Wi-Fi LED should be flashing.

![Location of button on bridge](/static/images/config_philips_hue.jpg)

error.no_discovery: No Roomba found during discovery. Is it turned on?
error.cannot_read_password: Cannot obtain password. Is the light flashing?
